message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I value the product at more than $10,000, I'm willing to compromise. How about we settle on $10,500? This price still allows me to cover my costs and is closer to your offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,250. Can we meet in the middle?
